attributes.action: NHS staff who are dismissed due to Long Covid to be awarded a medical pension.
attributes.additional_details:
There are no set rules or standards, no guidance and left to the whim of each individual health board. 
Every NHS staff member who contracted Long Covid in their line of duty, should be awarded an ill health retirement pension if they cannot continue to work.
attributes.background: Any NHS staff member who contracted Long Covid in their line of duty and cannot work, should be awarded an ill health retirement pension.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

NHS staff who are deemed permanently incapable of their NHS employment are already entitled to early retirement. Decisions about whether an employee is permanently incapable of their NHS employment, including because of long-term effects of coronavirus, is an operational matter for individual NHS employers, not the Government or Parliament.
